original: 與馬相在益州綿竹一帶聚眾起事，自稱黃巾軍，殺益州刺史郤儉，陸續攻陷巴郡、犍為等三郡後，馬相又僭稱為帝。後被劉焉、賈龍討伐。
text: He and Ma Xiang gathered in the Mianzhu area of Yizhou, claiming to be the Yellow Turban Army, killed the governor of Yizhou but thrifty, and successively captured the three counties of Ba County and Qianwei, and Ma Xiang was called the emperor again. Later he was conquered by Liu Yan and Jia Long.
